articles.description: IEX said it expects the rise in volumes to continue going forward. Increased electricity consumption coupled with easing supply side constraints led to an increase in the volumes of electricity traded on the exchange, it said.
articles.content: Indian Energy Exchange (IEX) shares jumped on Tuesday (February 6), a day after the electricity exchange said its total volumes reached a record level last month. The IEX stock gained by as much as R… [+1097 chars]

articles.title: What Went Wrong With Byju's, Which Was Once Valued At $22 Billion - NDTV
articles.description: Byju's, run by billionaire CEO Byju Raveendran, was the poster child of India's startup ecosystem. But in the last year, the company's valuation has seen a sharp decline with several of the company's investors now calling for leadership change.
articles.content:
Byju's is run by Byju Raveendran with his wife Divya Gokulnath.
